other_tests.findings: Numerous polyps with diameters ranging from 0.6 to 1.0 cm; ulceration and moderately differentiated adenocarcinoma in rectal polyps; tubular adenoma in transverse colon and sigmoid colon polyps.
Diffuse elevated FDG uptake along the entire colorectum; focal enlarged lymph nodes with increased FDG uptake; SUVmax ranged from 5.0 to 20.1 in intestines compared to hepatic SUVmax of 2.3.
Innumerable polyps in colorectal surgical specimen; low-to-moderately differentiated adenocarcinomas; FDG-avid perirectal lymph node confirmed as metastatic adenocarcinoma.
